frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-window-list
frozen.shortDescription: Display a window list at the bottom of the screen.
frozen.longDescription:
Display a window list at the bottom of the screen.
This extension is part of Classic Mode and is officially supported by GNOME. Please do not report bugs using the form below, use GNOME's GitLab instance instead.
